name: Sumerian Blood: Gilgamesh against the Gods
description: The deep sands of the desert are blend with the blood of Sumerian who fought in the battle that shaped the fate of the world. In a daring choice that was both heroic and selfish, Gilgamesh decided to take a last stand against the gods' army of An.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows 10
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: 64 bit Windows 10
